articles.author: Written by Health Desk
articles.title: Body Mass Index (BMI): Know how to calculate it according to your weight and height - India TV News
articles.description: Knowing your body mass index, or BMI, can be useful for assessing and adjusting your weight. It is not the most accurate measure of how much body fat you have, but it is the easiest and least expensive way to measure it.
articles.content: Body Mass Index (BMI) is widely used as an indicator of body fat content. Your weight alone is not sufficient to establish if you are in a healthy weight range. For example, a tall but slender person… [+2402 chars]
